jd: From: chakra, softcomsystems chakra.p@softcomsystems.com Reply to: chakra.p@softcomsystems.com Hi, Hope you are doing well. We are looking for Pega Lead System Architect (LSA)in Morristown, NJ (Onsite) with one of our Clients. If you are available and interested then please reply to me with details along with your updated resume in Word format. Below is the Job Description. Please give me a call back at Desk: 609-333-9000 Ext: 92 or you can E-Mail me at chakra.p@softcomsystems.comPosition: Pega Lead System Architect (LSA)Location: Morristown, NJ (Hybrid 3 Days Onsite)Duration: ContractJob Description:Note : Pega LSA Certification MandatoryTechnical Skills: (Primary)Need 14-16 years of IT Experience required7+ Pega LSA Certification Mandatory7 years’ experience with In-depth technical understanding of Pega Rules Process Commander (PRPC), Pega product knowledge and have experience with Java frameworksExperience in Pega Integrations with external Databases, Listeners, REST services, Messaging and SOAP.Troubleshoot complex application issues using Pega tools like Tracer, Pega Log Viewer, AES and PDC.Experience in Healthcare Industry is a plus but not necessary Customer service & leadershipLead, Build and Maintain a Pega 7.x/8.x application development while interfacing with and mentoring our vendor partner consultants.Co-ordinate with Technical Product Owners and Business community in refining business needs and provide technical solution.Work with Business Partners and Operational Leaders to ideate, design, develop and deliver technology solutions.Deliver reliable and secure software solutions meeting the operational specifications required through development of system logic.Review and guide code development from other team members through code reviews.Monitor all triage, debug, surveillance, performance, and scalability for all environments.Partner with Testers, having an understanding of automated testing patterns such as unit testing, mocking and automated integration testing Enforce Pega best design and coding practices and maintain high compliance level for Pega code.
